about.title: About
about.subtitle: Discover the story and values that drive Mishki

history.title: Our story
history.p1: Mishki was born from a passion for natural beauty and a deep respect for ancient Peruvian traditions. Our founder, after several trips to Peru, was amazed by the richness of the local biodiversity and the beauty secrets passed down from mother to daughter for generations.
history.p2: In Quechua, "Mishki" means "sweet" - a reference to the gentleness of the care we offer and our respectful approach towards nature and the communities we work with.
history.p3: Today, Mishki offers a range of natural skincare that combines the best of Peruvian tradition with the demands of modern cosmetics, for effective, ethical, and skin-respecting products.

natural.title: Natural
natural.desc: All our products are formulated from carefully selected natural ingredients.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.desc: We preserve ancestral Peruvian recipes passed down from generation to generation.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.desc: Our commitment to the environment guides each of our decisions and actions.

community.title: Community
community.desc: We support the local communities and producers we work with.

engagement.title: Our commitment
engagement.intro: At Mishki, we believe that beauty should never come at the expense of the planet or communities. That's why we are committed to:

list.ingredients: Using only natural and biodegradable ingredients
list.fair: Working in fair partnership with local producers
list.carbon: Reducing our carbon footprint at every production stage

engagement.title: Our commitment
engagement.subtitle: Responsible beauty for a sustainable future
engagement.hero_title: Beauty in service of the planet
engagement.hero_desc: At Mishki, we believe it's possible to take care of yourself while taking care of our planet. Our environmental and social commitment is at the heart of each of our decisions, from ingredient selection to the delivery of your orders.

ingredients.title: Natural ingredients
ingredients.desc: 100% of our ingredients are of natural origin, from organic farming or responsible wild harvesting.

packaging.title: Eco-designed packaging
packaging.desc: Our packaging is recyclable, biodegradable, or refillable. We minimize single-use plastic.

reforestation.title: Reforestation
reforestation.desc: For each order, we plant a tree in Peru in partnership with local associations.

water.title: Water preservation
water.desc: Our manufacturing processes are optimized to minimize water consumption.

fair.title: Fair trade
fair.desc: We work directly with Peruvian producers and guarantee them fair income.

energy.title: Renewable energy
energy.desc: Our warehouse and offices run on 100% renewable energy.

sourcing.title: Responsible sourcing
sourcing.desc: We select our ingredients directly from Peruvian producers practicing sustainable and biodiversity-respecting agriculture.

manufacturing.title: Ethical manufacturing
manufacturing.desc: Our products are manufactured in France in certified workshops, with environmentally friendly processes.

packaging.title: Minimal packaging
packaging.desc: We use only recycled or recyclable materials and eliminate any superfluous packaging.

delivery.title: Low-carbon delivery
delivery.desc: We prioritize carriers committed to reducing their carbon footprint and offset remaining emissions.

join.title: Join the movement
join.desc: By choosing Mishki, you actively participate in a more responsible consumption model. Together, let's build a future where beauty rhymes with sustainability.

rituals.title: Our Rituals
rituals.subtitle: Discover our beauty rituals inspired by Peruvian traditions for radiant skin
rituals.heading: Beauty Rituals

morning.title: Morning Ritual
morning.subtitle: Luminous Awakening
morning.desc: Start your day with a revitalizing ritual that awakens your skin and gives it radiance and energy to face the day.
morning.full_desc: This morning ritual is designed to prepare your skin to face daily aggressions. By following these simple yet effective steps, you provide optimal protection while stimulating its natural radiance. The active ingredients in our products work in synergy to hydrate, protect, and illuminate your complexion.

steps.name: Gentle cleansing
steps.desc: Start by gently cleansing your face with our exfoliating soap to remove nighttime impurities.

steps.name: Revitalizing toner
steps.desc: Apply toner to balance your skin's pH and prepare it for the following treatments.

steps.name: Hydrating serum
steps.desc: Massage a few drops of our beauty oil to deeply nourish.

steps.name: Day cream
steps.desc: Finish with your moisturizing cream to seal in hydration and protect your skin.

tips: Perform this ritual every morning for optimal results
Take time to massage your face to stimulate circulation
Wait a few minutes between each step for better absorption

evening.title: Evening Ritual
evening.subtitle: Nocturnal Regeneration
evening.desc: A soothing ritual to prepare your skin for nighttime cellular renewal and offer you a moment of relaxation.
evening.full_desc: Nighttime is ideal for your skin's regeneration. This evening ritual helps eliminate all impurities accumulated during the day and prepares your skin for its nighttime repair phase. The actives in our treatments work during your sleep for regenerated skin upon waking.

steps.name: Makeup removal
steps.desc: Remove all makeup and impurities with our gentle cleansing oil.

steps.name: Deep cleansing
steps.desc: Use our exfoliating soap for deep cleansing.

steps.name: Nourishing oil
steps.desc: Apply our beauty oil generously for intensive nourishment.

steps.name: Night cream
steps.desc: Seal with a rich cream for optimal nighttime hydration.

tips: Perform this ritual at least 30 minutes before bedtime
Enjoy this moment to relax and unwind
Change your pillowcases regularly for healthy skin

weekly.title: Weekly Ritual
weekly.subtitle: Intensive Treatment
weekly.desc: Give your skin a complete treatment once a week to maintain its radiance and long-term health.
weekly.full_desc: This weekly ritual is a true at-home spa moment. It allows deep cleansing and treating your skin with intensive care. Practiced regularly, you maintain your skin's radiance and youthfulness in the long term.

steps.name: Gentle scrub
steps.desc: Exfoliate your skin with our body scrub to remove dead cells.

steps.name: Steam bath
steps.desc: Open your pores with a 5-minute steam bath.

steps.name: Purifying mask
steps.desc: Apply our powder mask and leave on for 15 minutes.

steps.name: Facial massage
steps.desc: Massage your face with our oil to stimulate circulation.

steps.name: Intensive serum
steps.desc: Finish with a concentrated serum for visible results.

tips: Reserve this moment for the weekend when you have more time
Create a relaxing ambiance with soft music
Stay well hydrated before and after this ritual

detox.title: Detox Ritual
detox.subtitle: Deep Purification
detox.desc: A detoxification ritual to eliminate impurities and restore your skin's natural radiance.
detox.full_desc: Exposed to pollution, stress, and daily aggressions, your skin needs regular detoxification. This ritual deeply eliminates all accumulated toxins and allows your skin to regain its natural balance and original radiance.

steps.name: Deep cleansing
steps.desc: Double cleansing to remove all impurities.

steps.name: Detox mask
steps.desc: Application of a purifying clay-based mask.

steps.name: Intense hydration
steps.desc: Serum and cream to restore hydration.

tips: Ideal to do after a period of stress or excess
Drink plenty of water to accompany the detox
Avoid makeup for 24 hours after this ritual

s1.title: 1. Purpose
s1.text: These general terms and conditions of sale govern the contractual relationships between Mishki and any person making a purchase via our website. Any order implies unreserved acceptance of these conditions.

s2.title: 2. Products
s2.text: The products offered are those described on our site. Photographs are as faithful as possible but cannot guarantee perfect similarity with the product offered. Mishki reserves the right to modify the product range at any time.

s3.title: 3. Prices
s3.text: Prices are indicated in euros, all taxes included. Mishki reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, but products will be invoiced based on the rates in effect at the time of order validation.

s4.title: 4. Order
s4.text: The customer selects the products they wish to order and validates their order after reading these general conditions. Order validation constitutes acceptance of these conditions. An order confirmation is sent by email.

s5.title: 5. Payment
s5.text: Payment is made online by credit card via a secure payment platform. The order is validated after payment acceptance by banking institutions.

s6.title: 6. Delivery
s6.text: Products are delivered to the address indicated during the order. Delivery times are given for guidance only. Any delivery delay cannot give rise to damages or cancellation of the order.

s7.title: 7. Right of withdrawal
s7.text: In accordance with current legislation, the customer has a period of 14 days from receipt of their order to exercise their right of withdrawal, without having to justify reasons or pay penalties.

s8.title: 8. Liability
s8.text: Mishki cannot be held responsible for damages resulting from misuse of products. It is the customer's responsibility to verify the product's suitability for their intended use and to respect usage precautions.

s9.title: 9. Disputes
s9.text: These conditions are governed by French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought before any legal action. Failing that, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.

s10.title: 10. Contact
s10.text: For any questions regarding these conditions, you can contact us at: contact@mishki.fr

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Mishki, we place great importance on protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect and use your information.

s1.title: 1. Data collection
s1.text: We collect the information you provide when creating your account, placing orders, or exchanging with our customer service (name, email, address, etc.).

s2.title: 2. Data use
s2.text: Your data is used for order management, service improvement, and, if you have consented, sending information about our products and offers.

s3.title: 3. Data sharing
s3.text: Mishki does not sell your data to third parties. We share it only with our technical providers necessary for order execution (carriers, payment platforms).

s4.title: 4. Your rights
s4.text: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to the processing of your personal data.
